title: Ambient Video Game Music - Abandoned Monastery 2
description: Venture further into the mesmerizing world of ancient relics and sacred spaces with our sequel collection of 10 new ambient music tracks.
longDescription:
Venture further into the mesmerizing world of ancient relics and sacred spaces with our sequel collection of 10 new ambient music tracks. As a continuation of our previous journey into the hushed hallways and silent chambers of abandoned monasteries, this sequel delves even deeper, unearthing the hidden corners and shadowed nooks of these once-vibrant spiritual havens.


Over the span of 30 enchanting minutes, listeners are invited to traverse the sanctified grounds where nature slowly reclaims its space. Each 3-minute track unravels a chapter of an untold story, capturing the contrasting emotions of reverence and desolation, the weight of countless prayers, and the gentle embrace of time's passage.


In this sequel, the music evolves, introducing listeners to new layers and depths. From the faint whispers of monks from centuries gone by, to the soft sighs of the wind dancing through shattered stained glass windows, each soundscape is a rich tapestry woven with intricate details and resonating tones. Crafted with the same dedication to authenticity and nuance, the tracks promise an immersive experience that goes beyond mere listening.


This collection, with its enhanced compositions and heightened production values, reiterates our commitment to delivering unparalleled auditory journeys. It's an invitation to introspection, a conduit to ancient worlds, and a sanctuary for the soul. For those who cherished the first collection, this sequel offers a deeper plunge into meditative realms, fostering a deeper connection to history's embrace.


Priced at a modest $14.99, this sequel not only promises an evolution in musical experience but also extends a bridge between the earthly and the ethereal, intertwining the past's echoes with the listener's present.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--

Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
